body:
Comment 4 by **magius.varios**: 
I received incoming mails in the body of an HTTP-POST from AppEngine. I've printed the
mail bytes and there are only '\n' chars as line separators. 

I use "appengine/mail" to send mail, it hasn't any function to process received mails.
Then I'd tried to parse the mails with "mime" & "mime/multipart".
